deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text:
Functions available in this smart contract:
 1. Registeration for universities, programs, and students. And student enrollment into university, and a program.
 2. A university issuing degrees to its students.
 3. A third party verifying the student's degree details using the degree id.

Define set of students, universities, programs, and issued degrees.
 Define counts for each mapping to be able to track their length.
Store the address of the owner of the smart contract in the contract storage.
Error types used in the smart contract.

Default constructor to initialize the smart contract.
 Sets the address of the account deploying the smart contract to the owner variable.

documentation.text:
Function 2(b) - Return a list of degrees issued to a student.
 @return IssuedDegree[]

params._studentAddress: is the address of the student who wants to join the university.

params._universityAddress: is the address of the university.

params._studentAddress: is the public address of the student to whom the degree belongs to.

params._field: is the name of the field of study for the new program. Example: Computer Science and Engineering.
params._title: is the name of the new program. Example: Cloud Computing and Blockchain.

params._firstName: is the first name of the new student.
params._lastName: is the last name of the new student.

params._universityAddress: is the public address of the new university.
params._universityCountry: is the country of establishment of the new university.
params._universityName: is the legal name of the new university.

params._universityAddress: is the address of the university which the student wants to join.

params._degreeId: is the id of the degree issued to the student.

returns._0: ValidationResponse object with degree, student, and university details to be presented to the verifier.

InvalidDegreeError(string).notice: Error types used in the smart contract.

acceptStudent(address).notice: Function 1(g) - Accept a student in university.Only the requested university can accept a student.

constructor.notice: Default constructor to initialize the smart contract. Sets the address of the account deploying the smart contract to the owner variable.

getIssuedDegreesForStudent(address).notice: Function 2(b) - Return a list of degrees issued to a student.

getProgramsForUniversity(address).notice: Function 1(d) - Return a list of programs for a university.

getStudentsForUniversity(address).notice: Function 1(h) - Return a list of students enrolled in a university.

getUniversities().notice: Function 1(b) - Return a list of universities.

issueDegree(address).notice: Function 2(a) - A university issuing degrees to its students.Only a university account can issue a new degree.A university can only issue a degree for its own programs.Once degree is issued, student will be removed from the university and the program.

registerProgram(string,string).notice: Function 1(c) - Register a program.Only a active university account can create a new program. The new program will only belong to the university creating it.

registerStudent(string,string).notice: Function 1(e) - Register a student. Initially, the student will not be assigned to a university so the initial isEnrolled value will be false. Initially, the university address for the student will be set to 0.The owner of the contract cannot be a student at any university.The university and the student addresses cannot be same.         An address already belonging to a university account cannot also be used as the address for a new student.

registerUniversity(address,string,string.notice: Function 1(a) - Register a university.Only the contract owner can create a new university.

requestToJoinUniversity(address,bytes32).notice: Function 1(f) - Request to join a university.Only active students can request to join a university,         so the contract account, and any university account cannot create a request to join a university.

validateDegree(bytes32).notice: Function 3 - A third party verifying the student's degree using the degree id.

userdoc.notice: Functions available in this smart contract: 1. Registeration for universities, programs, and students. And student enrollment into university, and a program. 2. A university issuing degrees to its students. 3. A third party verifying the student's degree details using the degree id.
